situation: L was distraught when his usual teacher was absent and a substitute took over. He continually asked for his regular teacher, disrupting the class.
action: The substitute told L that there was nothing to be done and started the lesson without further addressing L's distress.
effect: L felt neglected and remained emotionally unsettled for the rest of the day, which affected his ability to engage in learning activities.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
